description: Shows logs for requests and metrics from customMetrics collected from Azure API Management, Application Insights and Azure OpenAI.

azureLogAnalytics.query: customMetrics

panels.title: customMetrics

azureLogAnalytics.query: requests

panels.title: requests

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where operation_Name contains "openai;rev" and type == "Backend"
| extend aoaibackend = split(split(target, "/", 2)[0], ".", 0)[0]
| extend second = duration/1000
| summarize round(avg(second),2) by tostring(aoaibackend),bin(timestamp, 1d)
| evaluate pivot(aoaibackend, max(avg_second))

panels.title: AOAIごとの1日あたりの平均応答時間（秒）

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where operation_Name contains "openai;rev" and type == "Backend"
| extend opemaimodel = split(split(tostring(name), "/deployments/", 1)[0], "/", 0)[0]
| extend second = duration/1000
| summarize round(avg(second),2) by tostring(opemaimodel),bin(timestamp, 1d)
| evaluate pivot(opemaimodel, max(avg_second))

panels.title: AOAIのモデルごとの1日あたりの平均応答時間(秒)

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where operation_Name contains "bingsearch" and type == "Backend"
| extend mcpbackend = split(split(target, "/", 2)[0], ".", 0)[0]
| extend second = duration / 1000
| summarize round(avg(second), 2) by tostring(mcpbackend), bin(timestamp, 1d)
| evaluate pivot(mcpbackend, max(avg_second))
//| render timechart

panels.title: MCPごとの1日あたりの平均応答時間（秒）

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where operation_Name contains "oauth;rev" and type == "Backend"
| extend oauthbackend = split(target, "/", 2)[0]
| extend second = duration / 1000
| summarize round(avg(second), 2) by tostring(oauthbackend), bin(timestamp, 1d)
| evaluate pivot(oauthbackend, max(avg_second))
//| render timechart

panels.title: Oauth API (Entra id)の1日あたりの平均応答時間（秒）

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where (operation_Name contains "bingsearch;rev" and operation_Name notcontains "oauth") and type == "Backend"
| extend second = duration/1000
| summarize round(avg(second),2) by operation_Name, bin(timestamp, 1d) 
| evaluate pivot(operation_Name, max(avg_second))
//| render timechart

panels.title: Bing MCP APIのオペレーションごとの1日あたりの平均応答時間(秒)

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where operation_Name contains "oauth-bingsearch;rev" and type == "Backend"
| extend second = duration/1000
| summarize round(avg(second),2) by operation_Name, bin(timestamp, 1d) 
| evaluate pivot(operation_Name, max(avg_second))
//| render timechart

panels.title: Bing Oauth MCP APIのオペレーションごとの1日あたりの平均応答時間(秒)

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where operation_Name contains "oauth;rev" and type == "Backend"

| evaluate pivot(operation_Name, max(avg_second))
//| render timechart

panels.title: Oauth API(Entra id)のオペレーションごとの1日あたりの平均応答時間(秒)

azureLogAnalytics.query:
requests
| where client_Type != "Browser"
| where success == false
| where operation_Name contains "openai;rev" and resultCode == "429"
| summarize response_429_count=count() by operation_Name, bin(timestamp, 1d)
| evaluate pivot(operation_Name, max(response_429_count))

panels.title: OpenAI APIのオペレーションごとの1日あたりのResponse 429の回数

azureLogAnalytics.query:
requests
| where operation_Name contains "mcp"
| extend mcpapi = split(operation_Name, ";", 0)[0]
| extend int_resultCode = toint(resultCode)
| where int_resultCode >= 400 and int_resultCode < 600
| summarize error_count=count(int_resultCode) by tostring(mcpapi), bin(timestamp, 1d)
| evaluate pivot(mcpapi, max(error_count))
//| render timechart

panels.title: MCP APIごとの1日あたりのエラーの回数

azureLogAnalytics.query:
requests
| where operation_Name contains "oauth;rev"
| extend mcpapi = split(operation_Name, ";", 0)[0]
| extend int_resultCode = toint(resultCode)
| where int_resultCode >= 400 and int_resultCode < 600
| summarize error_count=count(int_resultCode) by tostring(mcpapi), bin(timestamp, 1d)
| evaluate pivot(mcpapi, max(error_count))
//| render timechart

azureLogAnalytics.query:
customMetrics
| where name == "Prompt Tokens"
| extend parse_customDimensions = parse_json(customDimensions)
| where tostring(parse_customDimensions["API ID"]) == "openai"
| summarize avg_prompt_tokens=avg(value) by tostring(parse_customDimensions["Subscription ID"]), bin(timestamp, 1d)
| evaluate pivot(['parse_customDimensions_Subscription ID'], max(avg_prompt_tokens))
//| render timechart

panels.title: サブスクリプションごとの1日あたりの平均プロンプトトークン数

| where name == "Completion Tokens"

| where tostring(parse_customDimensions["API ID"]) == "openai"
| summarize avg_completion_tokens=avg(value) by tostring(parse_customDimensions["Subscription ID"]), bin(timestamp, 1d)
| evaluate pivot(['parse_customDimensions_Subscription ID'], max(avg_completion_tokens))
//| render timechart

azureLogAnalytics.query:
requests
| extend parse_customDimensions = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend apiid = tostring(parse_customDimensions["API Name"])
| where apiid != ""
| summarize requestcount = count() by bin(timestamp, 1d), apiid
| evaluate pivot(apiid, max(requestcount))

panels.title: APIごとの1日あたりのリクエスト数

azureLogAnalytics.query:
requests
| extend parse_customDimensions = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend apiid = tostring(parse_customDimensions["API Name"])
| where apiid == "openai"
| extend opemaimodel = split(split(tostring(url), "/deployments/", 1)[0], "/", 0)[0]
| where opemaimodel != "" and resultCode != "404"
| summarize requestcount = count() by bin(timestamp, 1d), tostring(opemaimodel)
| evaluate pivot(opemaimodel, max(requestcount))

panels.title: AIモデルごとの1日あたりのリクエスト数

azureLogAnalytics.query:
requests
| extend parse_customDimensions = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend apiid = tostring(parse_customDimensions["API Name"])
| extend subscriptionid = tostring(parse_customDimensions["Subscription Name"])
| where apiid == "openai" and subscriptionid != ""
| summarize requestcount = count() by bin(timestamp, 1d), subscriptionid
| evaluate pivot(subscriptionid, max(requestcount))

panels.title: 1日あたりのOauth API(Entra id)へのリクエスト数

azureLogAnalytics.query:
requests
| extend parse_customDimensions = parse_json(customDimensions)
| where tostring(parse_customDimensions["API Name"]) == "openai"
| extend responseremainingtokens = toint(parse_customDimensions["Response-remaining-tokens"])
| where isnotnull(responseremainingtokens)
| extend opemaimodel = split(split(tostring(url), "/deployments/", 1)[0], "/", 0)[0]
| summarize min_1m_remainingtokens=min(responseremainingtokens) by tostring(opemaimodel), bin(timestamp, 1m)
| summarize avg_remainingtokens=avg(min_1m_remainingtokens) by  opemaimodel, bin(timestamp, 1d)
| evaluate pivot(opemaimodel, max(avg_remainingtokens))

panels.title: AIモデルごとの1日あたりの平均使用可能トークン残量

| extend parse_customDimensions = parse_json(customDimensions)

| summarize min_1m_remainingtokens=min(responseremainingtokens) by tostring(opemaimodel), bin(timestamp, 1m)
| summarize min_remainingtokens=min(min_1m_remainingtokens) by  opemaimodel, bin(timestamp, 1d)
| evaluate pivot(opemaimodel, max(min_remainingtokens))

| where isnotnull(responseremainingtokens)
| extend Subscriptionname = tostring(parse_customDimensions["Subscription Name"])

azureLogAnalytics.query:
customMetrics
| where name == "Prompt Tokens"
| extend parse_customDimensions = parse_json(customDimensions)
| where tostring(parse_customDimensions["API ID"]) == "openai"
| summarize sum_prompt_tokens=sum(value) by tostring(parse_customDimensions["Subscription ID"]), bin(timestamp, 1m)
| evaluate pivot(['parse_customDimensions_Subscription ID'], max(sum_prompt_tokens))
//| render timechart

azureLogAnalytics.query:
customMetrics  
| where name == 'Total Tokens' 
| extend parsedCustomDimensions = parse_json(customDimensions) 
| extend clientIP = tostring(parsedCustomDimensions.['Client IP']) 
| extend apiId = tostring(parsedCustomDimensions.['API ID']) 
| extend apimSubscription = tostring(parsedCustomDimensions.['Subscription ID']) 
| extend UserId = tostring(parsedCustomDimensions.['User ID']) 
| project timestamp, value, clientIP, apiId, apimSubscription, UserId 
| order by timestamp asc

panels.title: customMetrics - custom query

azureLogAnalytics.query:
requests  
| project timestamp, duration, customDimensions 
| extend duration = round(duration, 2) 
| extend parsedCustomDimensions = parse_json(customDimensions) 
| extend apiName = tostring(parsedCustomDimensions.['API Name']) 
| extend apimSubscription = tostring(parsedCustomDimensions.['Subscription Name']) 
| extend userAgent = tostring(parsedCustomDimensions.['Request-User-agent']) 
| extend request_json = tostring(parsedCustomDimensions.['Request-Body']) 
| extend request = parse_json(request_json) 
| extend model = tostring(request.['model']) 
| extend messages = tostring(request.['messages']) 
| extend region = tostring(parsedCustomDimensions.['Response-x-ms-region']) 
| extend remainingTokens = tostring(parsedCustomDimensions.['Response-x-ratelimit-remaining-tokens']) 
| extend remainingRequests = tostring(parsedCustomDimensions.['Response-x-ratelimit-remaining-requests']) 
| extend response_json = tostring(parsedCustomDimensions.['Response-Body']) 
| extend response = parse_json(response_json) 
| extend promptTokens = tostring(response.['usage'].['prompt_tokens']) 
| extend completionTokens = tostring(response.['usage'].['completion_tokens']) 
| extend totalTokens = tostring(response.['usage'].['total_tokens']) 
| extend completion = tostring(response.['choices'][0].['message'].['content']) 
| project timestamp, apiName, apimSubscription, duration, userAgent, model, messages, completion, region, promptTokens, completionTokens, totalTokens, remainingTokens, remainingRequests 
| order by timestamp desc

panels.title: requests - custom query

azureLogAnalytics.query: customMetrics

panels.title: customMetrics

azureLogAnalytics.query: requests

panels.title: requests

azureResourceGraph.query:
resources
| where type =~ "Microsoft.Insights/components"
| extend name = tolower(name)
| project name

title: ${title}
